info.name: pomodoro-tracker dark
info.description:
A completely dark background for the pomodoro-tracker website. To look even better when embedded in Notion Dark mode.
There are options to pick dark or regular background color, and to hide everything but the Pomodoro counter.
Both options will change the dark background color to the one used in Notion Dark mode.

options.label: Yes
Dark
Notion Dark and Pomodoro Colorful
